name: Maractus
flavorText:
It uses an up-tempo song and dance
to drive away the bird Pokémon that
prey on its flower seeds.

previous.name: Darmanitan
previous.flavorText:
Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F,
making enough power that it can
destroy a dump truck with one punch.
previous.formDescription: Forms have different stats and types.  If Darmanitan's ability is zen mode, it changes to Zen Mode in battle if it ends a turn below 50% HP, and back to Standard Mode if it ends a turn at 50% HP or above, leaves battle, or loses its ability.

next.name: Dwebble
next.flavorText:
This Pokémon can easily melt holes in
hard rocks with a liquid secreted from
its mouth.

pokemon.name: Maractus
pokemon.flavorText:
It uses an up-tempo song and dance
to drive away the bird Pokémon that
prey on its flower seeds.
